headline: Bank of New York Mellon (NYSE:BK) shareholders have earned a 28% CAGR over the last five years
summary: When you buy shares in a company, it's worth keeping in mind the possibility that it could fail, and you could lose...

headline: BNY’s Q4 Earnings Call: Our Top 5 Analyst Questions
summary: BNY’s fourth quarter results were well received by the market, with management crediting the strong performance to ongoing execution in its platform model, expanded client relationships, and notable progress in digital assets and AI integration. CEO Robin Vince emphasized that the company achieved “record sales performance for the year,” citing new wins in banking as a service and integrated data analytics as key contributors.
